short_summary: Service and repair of commercial kitchen equipment
description: Provide labour, materials, supervision, transportation and equipment for the inspection, service and repair of commercial kitchen equipment on an as and when required basis. See full details in the tender document.
full_summary:
================

# Request for Proposal (RFP) W6889-230149

## Service and Repair of Commercial Kitchen Equipment

### ITT Number: WS3884280273

* Bid Opportunity Title: RFP W6889-230149 Service and Repair Commercial Kitchen Equipment
* Posting Date: February 22, 2023
* Closing Date: March 16, 2023, 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

### **Summary of Contract Requirements**

Canada is soliciting proposals from Offerors to provide commercial kitchen equipment inspection, service, and repair services on a contractual basis for the Department of National Defence at Garrison Petawawa. This RFP covers a one-time service contract for a four-year term.

**Key Contractual Details**

* Subject Matter of the Contract: Commercial kitchen equipment inspection, service, and repair services.
* Contract Duration: 4 years
* Locations: Garrison Petawawa, Petawawa
* Language of Contract: English, French

**Contracting Authority**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested Offerors to submit their proposal through the Ariba Discovery electronic tendering system.

**Notice of Tender**

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time have been modified. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 16, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive.

**Mandatory Site Visit**

A mandatory site visit is scheduled for March 7, 2023, at 9:30 EST at Garrison Petawawa. Interested Offerors are required to attend the site visit.

**Request for Proposal Documents**

Request for Proposal (RFP) documents are available through the Ariba Discovery electronic tendering system at [http://discovery.ariba.com](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15487132?extsite=MTU0ODcxMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Contact Information**

* Darlene Keenan (TPSGC/PSPC), darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This rewritten and edited version is more polished, clear, and concise. 
The italics are removed for the UNPS code, the trade agreements and regions. The text is re-organized and simplified to ensure easier read and comprehension. Good luck with your contracts tendering
